column1: #text=Every Tuesday night I make the same routine .
#text=I go out and buy groceries that night .
#text=However , this week was different and I had a party to prepare for the weekend to celebrate a friend 's birthday .
#text=I created a check list of all the things I needed earlier in the day , and headed out to the store .
#text=On arrival I went down each lane , and picked out on what I needed exactly .
#text=This process can be very boring so I kept my MP3 player along with me to play music while I shop .
#text=After about 30 minutes of looking around , I finally had everything that I needed !
#text=I go to the cashier , and ended up picking up a magazine on the way there .
#text=I paid the cashier using my credit card after watching them scan and bag my groceries .
#text=I brought the kart all the way to my car and packed everything in .
